CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: rail
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The high speed ammunition disrupts armor and tissue in equal measure.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: ion charged rail
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Designed to combat mechanoids, the projectile creates an electrical current on impact, disrupting electronic systems temporarily.
